item.description:
Feel like presenting? We have one, but there's always room for more! Speak up if you have suggestions/ideas!

The agenda is:

1) Intro's for new folks
2) General topic discussion
3) General hacking.
4) Very maybe a presentation on (your presentation here...yes you...seriously).
5) We'll be discussing the first chapter of the Ruby Metaprogramming Book. You don't have to own it, or bring it, but we'll be talking about it.

http://pragprog.com/t...

*ALSO* The MathWorks has an opening upcoming for a web-application developer. It's a 50/50 split between ruby and java, though it will eventually slide more towards ruby. Swing by and we can discuss it as well.
item.how_to_find_us: I'm the loud guy with the beard. :P
item.name: The Metrowest Ruby Users Group Monthly Meetup
